original_text: Then Jeremiah said unto all the people, to the men, and to the women, and to all the people which had given him that answer, saying,
korean_text: 예레미야가 남녀 모든 무리 곧 이 말로 대답하는 모든 백성에게 일러 이르되

sentences.original_text: Then Jeremiah said unto all the people,
sentences.korean_translation: 이에 예레미야가 모든 백성에게 말하여 이르되

sentences.original_text: to the men, and to the women,
and to all the people which had given him that answer,
sentences.korean_translation: 그에게 그 대답을 주었던 모든 백성에게
